jcr:content.jcr:title: Pro - Plasma Cutter
jcr:content.seoDescription: Logitech Pro Gaming Mouse helps you compete at the highest levels with advanced sensors, high dpi, 6 programmable buttons, and state-of-the-art design.
jcr:content.seoPageTitle: Logitech Pro Gaming Mouse for Esport Pros

copyblock.mainTitle: BATTLEFIELD 1 LIGHTING INTEGRATION WITH LOGITECH GAMING SOFTWARE
ENDEAVOR- BUILDING A GAMING MOUSE FOR PRO ESPORT ATHLETES

banner_copy_block.mainDescription: In esports, winning isn’t measured in meters or seconds but micrometers and milliseconds. When the stakes are at their highest, a single click can be the difference between going home with $5k or with $500k. That’s why Logitech G created PRO. Its engineered for the incredible speed and precision needed to win.

bannercopyblock.mainDescription: In esports, winning isn’t measured in meters or seconds but micrometers and milliseconds. When the stakes are at their highest, a single click can be the difference between going home with $5k or with $500k. That’s why Logitech G created PRO. Its engineered for the incredible speed and precision needed to win.

copyblock.mainDescription: PRO was inspired by the classic lines and simple construction of the Logitech G100 and G100s chassis made famous by top competitive esports professionals. Consistency and comfort are critical to performing at your best. PRO mouse delivers both.

Consistent responsiveness and accuracy makes a critical difference in high-stakes competitive gameplay. The PMW3366 optical sensor delivers incredible precision and zero smoothing, filtering or acceleration across the entire DPI range (200-12,000DPI). PRO performs with pixel-precise tracking accuracy at any speed. Customize your DPI settings using Logitech Gaming Software (LGS).

Advanced button tensioning in Logitech G Pro gaming mouse enhances the consistency of the left/right mouse buttons and helps reduce the force needed required to click. This results in crisp, reliable click performance you can depend on at the highest level of competition.

Logitech G PRO Gaming Mouse can be used out-of-the-box with preset button settings or can be fully configured to your custom preferences using LGS. All six buttons can be binded to activate in-game commands and more.

PRO Mouse comes complete with ~16.8M color customization perfect for representing your team colors, personalizing your setup, or synchronizing with other G products. LIGHTSYNC also features game-driven lighting effects that respond to in-game action, audio visualization, screen color sampling and more. Program it all with LGS.

With an onboard memory, you can save your preferences directly to the mouse for competition systems using LGS. Skip installing custom software or reconfiguring your settings. Get straight to the game.

Built on over 30 years of Logitech expertise in engineering, building, testing mice, PRO is designed to withstand pro esports players during train and tournament season. The surface of PRO is coated for durability and grip. The feet are tested to perform for over 250 km of use. Left and right buttons exceed 20 million clicks, equivalent to training 10 hours every day for two years.

_x0034_.subtext: Max. acceleration: > 40 G Tested on Logitech G240 Gaming Mouse Pad

_x0035_.subtext: Max. speed: > 400 IPS2 Tested on Logitech G240 Gaming Mouse Pad

_x0032_.subtext: PTFE Feet: 250-km range Tested on Logitech G240 Gaming Mouse Pad

_x0035_.text: Internet access for Logitech Gaming Software (optional)
